snippet: COOPER--Henry S.F.,Jr. The family of Henry S.F. Cooper, Jr., invites you to a celebration of his life on Thursday, May 26 at 5pm at The Century Association at 7 West 43rd Street, New York. 1/3
lead_paragraph: COOPER--Henry S.F.,Jr. The family of Henry S.F. Cooper, Jr., invites you to a celebration of his life on Thursday, May 26 at 5pm at The Century Association at 7 West 43rd Street, New York. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  COOPER, HENRY S.F.
